item.title: Jess add a quote by Annie Dillard
item.description: "There is always the temptation in life to diddle around making itsy-bitsy friends and meals and journeys for years on end. It is all so self conscience, so apparently moral...But I won't have it. The world is wilder than that in all directions, more dangerous...more extravagant and bright. We are...raising tomatoes when we should be raising Cain, or Lazarus." -- Annie Dillard

item.title: Jess add a quote by Elizabeth Stone
item.description: "Making the decision to have a child - it is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body. " -- Elizabeth Stone

item.title: Jess add a quote by Cornel West
item.description: "The country is in deep trouble. We've forgotten that a rich life consists fundamentally of serving others, trying to leave the world a little better than you found it. We need the courage to question the powers that be, the courage to be impatient with evil and patient with people, the courage to fight for social justice. In many instances we will be stepping out on nothing, and just hoping to land on something. But that's the struggle. To live is to wrestle with despair, yet never allow despair to have the last word." -- Cornel West

item.title: Jess add a quote by Annie Dillard
item.description: "How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives." -- Annie Dillard
